## Prerequisites: Python 3.12.10

Aegis requires Python `3.12.10`. Before you begin, check if itâ€™s already installed:

<Tabs items={['Mac/Linux', 'Windows']}>

<Tab value="Mac/Linux">

```bash
python3 --version
```

or

```bash
python3.12 --version
```

</Tab>

<Tab value="Windows">

```bash
python --version
```

or

```bash
py -3.12 --version
```

</Tab>

</Tabs>

If the output doesn't show Python `3.12.10`, follow the Python Setup Guide to install it
and then come back.
